# Relationship between cholorphyll-*a* and nutrients in the Santa Barbara Channel

Chlorophyll-*a* is an incredibly important pigment found in most plants worldwide, giving them their green color, and is a key player in photosynthesis. Not only is chl-a found in plants on land, it is also present in all phytoplankton species living in oceans, lakes, streams, and more.
